influxdb-resource-continuous_query.body:
resource "influxdb_continuous_query" "$1" {
    # query - (Required) The query for the continuous_query. 
    query = ""

    # database - (Required) The database for the continuous_query. This must be an existing influxdb database.
    database = ""

    # name - (Required) The name for the continuous_query. This must be unique on the InfluxDB server.
    name = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
influxdb-resource-continuous_query.description: The continuous_query resource allows a continuous query to be created on an InfluxDB server.

influxdb-resource-database.description: The database resource allows a database to be created on an InfluxDB server.

influxdb-resource-user.body:
resource "influxdb_user" "$1" {
    # privilege - (Required) The privilege to grant (READ|WRITE|ALL)
    privilege = ""

    # database - (Required) The name of the database the privilege is associated with
    database = ""

    # password - (Required) The password for the user. 
    password = ""

    # name - (Required) The name for the user. 
    name = ""

    # admin - (Optional) Mark the user as admin.
    admin = ""

    # grant - (Optional) A list of grants for non-admin users
    grant = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "admin" - (Bool) indication if the user is an admin or not.
}
influxdb-resource-user.description: The user resource allows a user to be created on an InfluxDB server.
